import React from'react';import'./HeroSection.css';import{useThemeSettings}from'../../context/theme/ThemeSettingsContext/ThemeSettingsContext';import CTAButton from'../CTAButton/CTAButton';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HeroSection=_ref=>{let{title,subtitle,backgroundVideo,align='center',overlayOpacity=0.5,buttonText='Enter',buttonAction='/home',additionalContent=null// Allows injecting additional content like images, badges, etc.
